reporter_caption.center: YELLOW CAB CO. v. GREATER HARTFORD TRANSIT DIST., 223 Conn. 918 (1992)

caption.center: YELLOW CAB COMPANY ET AL. v. GREATER HARTFORD TRANSIT DISTRICT ET AL.

opinion.opinion_text:
The plaintiffs' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 27 Conn. App. 920, is denied.
Julia Morris Paul, in support of the petition.
Glenn E. Brace and M. Katherine Bertini, in opposition.
